name: UFGDecorationDescriptor
comment: Copyright 2016-2019 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: GetGroundMesh
methods.comment:
The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when placed on ground
@return The items mesh; a default mesh if the item has no mesh specified, nullptr if inClass is nullptr.

methods.name: GetMesh1p
methods.comment:
The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 1p.
@return The items mesh; a default mesh if the item has no mesh specified, nullptr if inClass is nullptr.

methods.name: GetMesh3p
methods.comment:
The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 3p.
@return The items mesh; a default mesh if the item has no mesh specified, nullptr if inClass is nullptr.

methods.name: GetDecorationActorClass
methods.comment: @return The actor to spawn on primary fire, can be null

properties.name: mGroundMesh
properties.comment: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when placed on ground.

properties.name: mGroundMeshScale
properties.comment: Scale that can be used for the ground mesh

properties.name: mMesh1p
properties.comment: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 1p.

properties.name: mMesh3p
properties.comment: The static mesh we want for representing the decoration when equipped in 3p.

properties.name: mDecorationActorClass
properties.comment: The actor to spawn on primary fire press if we want one, can be null
